scripts.lint: npm --prefix backend run lint:fix && npm --prefix frontend run lint:fix
scripts.down: npx --yes --prefix backend tsx@4.7.0 backend/scripts/docker-clean.ts backend/docker-compose.yml ministerra
scripts.nuke: npx --yes --prefix backend tsx@4.7.0 backend/scripts/docker-clean.ts backend/docker-compose.yml ministerra --prune-volumes
scripts.dev-: npm run down && docker compose -p ministerra -f backend/docker-compose.yml --profile dev up -d && docker compose -p ministerra -f backend/docker-compose.yml logs -f backend-app frontend-dev
scripts.dev: docker compose -p ministerra -f backend/docker-compose.yml restart backend-app frontend-dev && docker compose -p ministerra -f backend/docker-compose.yml logs -f backend-app frontend-dev
